statements: UPDATE Visitors SET age = 30, location = 'New York' WHERE visitor_id = 1001;

UPDATE Visitors SET gender = 'Female', interests = 'Programming, Travel' WHERE name = 'Alice';

UPDATE visitor_preferences SET lodging_preferences = 'Ocean View' WHERE visitor_id = 101;

UPDATE Visitors SET phone_number = '+1234567890', country = 'USA' WHERE visitor_id = 1
